    • Constructor Detail

      • StockQuoteAnalyzer

        public StockQuoteAnalyzer(java.lang.String symbol,
                          StockQuoteGeneratorInterface stockQuoteSource,
                          StockTickerAudioInterface audioPlayer)
                   throws InvalidStockSymbolException,
                          java.lang.NullPointerException,
                          StockTickerConnectionError
        Parameters:
        symbol - This is the stock symbol that is being analyzed.
        stockQuoteSource - This is the source that is to be used to obtain the stock quotes.
        Throws:
        InvalidStockSymbolException - Will be thrown if the symbol for the stock is invalid.
        java.lang.NullPointerException - Will be thrown if the stock quote source is null.
        StockTickerConnectionError - Will be thrown if the class can not connect to the stock quote source.

    • Method Detail

      • refresh

        public void refresh()
             throws StockTickerConnectionError
        Get the latest stock info from the source and analyze it.
        Throws:
        StockTickerConnectionError - Will be thrown if the routine is unable to obtain a current stock quote.

      • playAppropriateAudio

        public void playAppropriateAudio()
        This method will cause the appropriate audio to play back based on how the stock is doing. If the stock is up by more than 1% since the open or by more than $1.00 since the last check, happy music will be played. If the stock is down by 1% or more or by more than $1.00 since the last check, then sad music will play. However, nothing will happen if the audio player is null. If for some reason there is an error with the internal state, then error music will be played.

      • getSymbol

        public java.lang.String getSymbol()
        Returns:
        the symbol

      • getPreviousOpen

        public double getPreviousOpen()
                       throws InvalidAnalysisState
        This method will return the previous open for the given stock.
        Returns:
        The previous closing value for the stock will be returned.
        Throws:
        InvalidAnalysisState - An InvalidAnalysisState Exception will be thrown if a quote has not yet been retrieved.

      • getCurrentPrice

        public double getCurrentPrice()
                       throws InvalidAnalysisState
        This method will return the current selling price for the given stock.
        Returns:
        The return value will be the last traded value for the given stock, otherwise known as the current price.
        Throws:
        InvalidAnalysisState - An InvalidAnalysisState Exception will be thrown if a quote has not yet been retrieved.

      • getChangeSinceOpen

        public double getChangeSinceOpen()
                          throws InvalidAnalysisState
        This method will return the change since the previous open for the given stock.
        Returns:
        The change in dollars will be returned.
        Throws:
        InvalidAnalysisState - An InvalidAnalysisState Exception will be thrown if a quote has not yet been retrieved.

      • getPercentChangeSinceOpen

        public double getPercentChangeSinceOpen()
                                 throws InvalidAnalysisState
        This method will return the percent change for the given stock since opening.
        Returns:
        The percent change for the given stock will be returned. It will be accurate to the nearest .01%.
        Throws:
        InvalidAnalysisState - An InvalidAnalysisState Exception will be thrown if a quote has not yet been retrieved.

      • getChangeSinceLastCheck

        public double getChangeSinceLastCheck()
                               throws InvalidAnalysisState
        This method will return the change in price since the last check. If the market is open, this will be the change that has occurred since the last time the value was checked. If the market is closed or the value has not changed since the last check, then this will be 0.
        Returns:
        The raw changed value for the given stock will be returned.
        Throws:
        InvalidAnalysisState - An invalid analysis state will be thrown if there have not been two successful updates retrieved from the stock quote data source.

      • getCurrentQuote

        final StockQuoteInterface getCurrentQuote()
        This method will obtain the current quote from inside the system.
        Returns:
        the currentQuote
